DataElement.preferredName: Gravida Breast Feeding Fertile Patient Until 120 Day Post Treatment Regimen Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a woman is pregnant or nursing an infant or expecting to conceive duration the time of a clinical trial throughout 120 days after the final dose of trial treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Gravida Breast Feeding Fertile Patient Until 120 Day Post Treatment Regimen
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A woman who currently is pregnant or has been in the past, irrespective of the pregnancy outcome._The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast._Able to produce children._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Up to the point of some specific time or event._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::120_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A woman who currently is pregnant or has been in the past, irrespective of the pregnancy outcome.:The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.:Able to produce children.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A woman who currently is pregnant or has been in the past, irrespective of the pregnancy outcome.
The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Until Integer::120 Day Post Treatment Regimen
Property.preferredDefinition: Up to the point of some specific time or event.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::120:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

Concepts.definition: Up to the point of some specific time or event.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is pregnant or breastfeeding,
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is pregnant or breastfeeding, or expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the pre-screening or screening visit through 120 days after the last dose of trial treatment. (If not a woman of childbearing potential, please check N/A.)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient pregnant or breastfeeding, or expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the pre-screening or screening visit through 120 days after the last dose of trial treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is pregnant or breastfeeding, or is expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the screening visit through 120 days after the last dose of trial treatment.
